element.name: Arawai
element.source: Eberron: Rising from the Last War

description.p: Arawai is the Sovereign of Life and Love. She is the patron of fertility and of the benevolent aspects of nature, bringing good harvest and gentle rain.

setters.set: Sheaf of wheat tied with green ribbon or bronze dragon

element.name: Aureon
element.source: Eberron: Rising from the Last War

description.p: Aureon is the Sovereign of Law and Lore. He is considered the first wizard, who shared the secrets of wizardry with the world.

element.name: Balinor
element.source: Eberron: Rising from the Last War

description.p: Balinor is the Sovereign of Horn and Hunt. He guides both the beast and the hunter, and he is the patron of those who walk on the edge of civilization and the natural world.

setters.set: Pair of antlers or green dragon

element.name: Boldrei
element.source: Eberron: Rising from the Last War

description.p: Boldrei is the Sovereign of Hall and Hearth. She guides and protects communities and families, inspiring people to work together for the common good.

setters.set: Fire in a stone hearth or copper dragon

element.name: Dol Arrah
element.source: Eberron: Rising from the Last War

description.p: Doi Arrah is the sun that drives away the darkness. She stands for wisdom in war and for those who fight with honor, pursue justice, and make sacrifices for the greater good.

element.name: Dol Dorn
element.source: Eberron: Rising from the Last War

description.p: Doi Dorn is the Sovereign of Strength and Steel. He is the patron of the common soldier, and he guides the hands of anyone who holds a weapon. He embodies courage, strength, and martial skill.

setters.set: Longsword crossed over a shield or silver dragon

element.name: Kol Korran
element.source: Eberron: Rising from the Last War

description.p: Kol Korran is the Sovereign of World and Wealth. He guards travelers and guides traders. Although the Trickery domain is suggested for his clerics, Kol Korran guides fair negotiation; those driven solely by greed prefer the Keeper of the Dark Six.

setters.set: Nine-sided gold coin or white dragon

element.name: Olladra
element.source: Eberron: Rising from the Last War

description.p: Olladra is the Sovereign of Feast and Fortune. She is the giver of joy and the granter of luck, patron to entertainers, gamblers, and anyone who takes a chance.

element.name: Onatar
element.source: Eberron: Rising from the Last War

description.p: Onatar is the Sovereign of Fire and Forge. He guides both mundane smiths and artificers, inspiring anyone who performs an act of creation.

setters.set: Crossed hammer and tongs or brass dragon

element.name: The Devourer
element.source: Eberron: Rising from the Last War

description.p: The Devourer governs the destructive power of nature, both pure elemental force and savagery in beasts.

setters.set: Bundle of five sharpened bones or dragon turtle

element.name: The Fury
element.source: Eberron: Rising from the Last War

description.p: The Fury governs both passion and revenge, rage and despair. She offers revenge to those who have been wronged, but her vengeance often leads to suffering.

setters.set: Winged wyrm with woman’s head and arms

element.name: The Keeper
element.source: Eberron: Rising from the Last War

description.p: The Keeper snatches souls before they can reach Dolurrh and hoards them along with his vast wealth. Those driven by greed call him their patron, and his priests often act as criminal fixers.

setters.set: Dragonshard in the shape of a fang or dracolich

element.name: The Mockery
element.source: Eberron: Rising from the Last War

description.p: The Mockery is the patron of treachery and of terror in battle. He guides those who seek victory through guile, both warriors and assassins. He was once the brother of Doi Dorn and Doi Arrah, but he was stripped of his skin and his name after betraying them.

setters.set: Five blood-spattered blades or flayed dragon

element.name: The Shadow
element.source: Eberron: Rising from the Last War

description.p: The Shadow is the dark side of knowledge and ambition. It’s said to be Aureon’s shadow, given malign life when Aureon mastered magic. The Shadow is the maker of monsters and the keeper of forbidden secrets, and it offers malevolent spells to warlocks and wizards.

element.name: The Traveler
element.source: Eberron: Rising from the Last War

description.p: The Traveler asserts that chaos drives evolution and that change makes us stronger. The Traveler is a trickster and the giver of dangerous gifts. Some artificers worship the Traveler, seeing it as the lord of innovation, but the gifts of the Traveler always have unexpected consequences.

element.name: The Silver Flame
element.source: Eberron: Rising from the Last War

ul.li: The Silver Flame is force of light that holds fiends at bay. Those who seek to defend the innocent from evil can draw on the power of the Flame.
Every mortal soul can find the light. Inspire and guide others to virtuous behavior; force is a last resort.
Listen to the Voice of the Flame; beware the deceiving whispers of the Shadow in the Flame.

setters.set: Flame drawn on silver or molded from silver

element.name: The Blood of Vol
element.source: Eberron: Rising from the Last War

ul.li: Everyone has a spark of divinity. Find that power within.
Death is the end, Dolurrh is oblivion, and if the gods exist, they are cruel. Stand with those you care for; all we have is this life and each other.

element.name: Cults of the Dragon Below
element.source: Eberron: Rising from the Last War

ul.li: A paradise exists within the world, a vale bathed in the light of the Inner Sun. Earn your passage with the blood of worthy foes.
Our existence is a chrysalis state, preparing us for transcendent immortality within the bowels of the gibbering mouther.
The Lord of Eyes sees all secrets. Its gaze elevates the worthy and slays the unbeliever. Drive doubt from your heart, and you will see reality through new eyes.

element.name: The Path of Light
element.source: Eberron: Rising from the Last War

ul.li: We live in an age of darkness. We must find the path that leads to the light.
Act with compassion and courage. Each noble act is a step on the path.
Hone your body and your mind. You are the tool you will use to change reality.

element.name: The Spirits of the Past
element.source: Eberron: Rising from the Last War

ul.li: We are the spiritual anchors of the greatest champions of our people. Through our faith, we keep their spirits from being lost to oblivion.
You have been chosen by a hero. Live your life as they lived theirs, letting their instincts guide you.
Treasure our past and the stories of our people. You are the vessel through which new legends will arise.

element.name: The Undying Court
element.source: Eberron: Rising from the Last War

ul.li: Our greatest champions and sages will never be lost to us. Their wisdom guides us, and their power protects us all.
Honor our past. Respect our traditions. Perfect your skills and you may earn your place among the Deathless.
Destroy those foul creatures that channel the power of Mahar, for they consume the essence of our world.
